io.rapid

Class RapidDocumentReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.rapid.RapidDocumentReference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the items in collection

    public class RapidDocumentReference<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Rapid.io document reference

    Provides methods for querying data and mutating data

      • mutate

        public RapidFuture mutate(T item,
                          java.lang.String etag)
        Mutate document (set new value)

        Operation will fail when provided etag value does not equal current etag on backend (document was modified in the meantime)

        Parameters:
        item - new content for the document
        etag - etag value expected to be present on backend
        Returns:
        RapidFuture providing callbacks for onComplete, onError, onSuccess events

      • concurrencySafeMutate

        public RapidFuture concurrencySafeMutate(RapidDocumentReference.DocumentTransformer<T> documentTransformer)
        Concurrency-safe mutate document (set new value)

        When you provide document transformer, this operation will safely update document value, because within documentTransformer you can be sure you are updating the latest version available on backend.

        The SDK will automatically try to update the document until there is no conflicting version on backend so the document transformer function may be called multiple times.

        Parameters:
        documentTransformer - function responsible for updating the latest version of document available on backend
        Returns:
        RapidFuture providing callbacks for onComplete, onError, onSuccess events

      • delete

        public RapidFuture delete()
        Delete the document from collection
        Returns:
        RapidFuture providing callbacks for onComplete, onError, onSuccess events

      • delete

        public RapidFuture delete(java.lang.String etag)
        Delete the document from collection

        Operation will fail when provided etag value does not equal current etag on backend (document was modified in the meantime)

        Parameters:
        etag - etag value expected to be present on backend
        Returns:

      • safeDelete

        public RapidFuture safeDelete(RapidDocumentReference.DocumentDeleteTransformer<T> documentDeleteTransformer)
        Concurrency-safe mutate document (set new value)

        When you provide document transformer, this operation will safely delete document value, because within documentTransformer you can be sure you are updating the latest version available on backend.

        The SDK will automatically try to delete the document until there is no conflicting version on backend so the document transformer function may be called multiple times.

        Parameters:
        documentDeleteTransformer - function responsible for deleting the latest version of document available on backend - return true if document should be deleted
        Returns:
        RapidFuture providing callbacks for onComplete, onError, onSuccess events

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(RapidCallback.Document<T> callback)
        Subscribe to single document updates
        Parameters:
        callback - callback function providing updated document on Main thread

        public void fetch(RapidCallback.Document<T> callback)
        One-time fetch document value
        Parameters:
        callback - callback function providing document value on Main thread
